There is a little shop selling local products (mainly date products) and ice lollies. You can easily wile away a couple of hours here and, if you are in the area, it's well worth a visit. It's open all day.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We found the place based on the information on the guide book. The garden is nice but we thought that it would be much bigger. It took us only approx 30 min to walk around. Fee was 5‚Ç¨/adult and 2,5‚Ç¨/child.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
What a treat ! After having spent a Cultural morning at some of the amazing museums in town we made our way to this beautiful little park.
It was perfect to relax and stroll round this extraordinary place.
The park is wonderfully maintained and easy to go around.
Definitely a ‚Äúmust‚Äù if you‚Äôre in Elche!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We spent a couple of hours wandering around this fascinating tropical garden. While not particularly knowledgeable about plants and trees, it was interesting to see all the different specimens, including the Imperial Palm, and also a sculpture of La Dama de Elche.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: A very attractive and well maintained garden. Whilst relatively small it is tranquil with lots of interesting areas and good plantings. Lots of shade and seating.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A small private garden with a lot to enjoy !
conteudo: The garden is opposite the wonderful hotel which holds the same name Huerta del curo and 1 mn walk from the small museum of the palm. It is absolutely charming and worth visiting when they is not a big coach of tourists ! Its displays of cacti is amazing with use of ponds and water features. The main attraction seems to be the imperial palm tree of course but there is much more to see in this garden . A small shop has some souvenirs, ice creams and hot drinks and seeds/plants to buy.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
We visited Elche specifically to see this garden and were not disappointed. The place is tranquil, shady, well maintained. Whilst the palms are the main focus of the garden, the other aspects are really well executed. The cactus garden is very impressive, with some nearly as tall as the surrounding palms. We were there at the wrong time of year for the water lilies and lotuses, but the ponds still had interest.
Highly recommended.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: I stumbled across this stunning hotel on booking.com. Unfortunately I only stayed one night with my mum but I could have happily stayed forever. The gardens, the food, the service and the decor are all impeccable. Coming back ASAP.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This lovley tranquil garden was a haven from the afternoon heat. We were kept amused by the resident peacocks antics. Their little ones were quite sweet. There were lovely vistas every where you looked. We went late in the afternoon after all the tour coaches had gone and there was only a few other people there. There is a kiosk there which is where we saw the peacocks hanging around.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Tranquil haven in a busy city
conteudo: Beautiful gardens with a wide range of trees and plants, including its famous imperial palm and amazing albino peacocks. A lovely place to while away an hour or so.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A Perfect Oasis in the Middle of the City
conteudo: This is a beautiful garden shaded by numerous magnificent palms. The borders and paths are kept pristine and the plants are well tended. If you are in Elche this is a ‚Äòmust see‚Äô. A stroll around the garden will take a maximum of an hour and the entrance fee is a few euros. In the warm weather this would be a virtual oasis

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: What an extraordinary experience! Wandering through this lush, tropical oasis in the middle of a good sized city

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Although small, this garden is so full of wonderful plants and animals you can spend a couple of hours walking through.

Well worth a visit

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A Beautiful Garden in the City of Elche
conteudo: This is a lovely garden to visit for round about an hour. It has arrows to follow in order to see the entire garden. I wouldn't normally be keen to be so 'managed' and follow a route, however this works really well and ensures you miss nothing. The trees are all clearly labelled, the garden is beautifully manicured and it also contains a whole range of Mediterranean and tropical plants. It is well worth visiting if you love gardens. It has benches dotted around and I would imagine would be a cool retreat in the middle of a hot Summer, I visited in December when it was bright and cool.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This place is beautiful. We stayed half board for one night so we could explore the area. It's very relaxing, the staff are friendly, and the setting surrounded by palm trees is stunning. The rooms are lovely as was the evening meal and breakfast.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Stayed here several times for work. This is a fabulous hotel in a central location and you would never know from the green surroundings that this is in the middle of town its so quiet. Food is great and staff are lovely.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: what a beautiful place to visit!
conteudo: This is not a big garden, but a very unlikely garden to find in a city centre. The amazing range and species of plants are incredible and to think they have been there for centuries! We visited in November so it was very quiet and very peaceful but the grounds are kept to the highest of standard. well worth a little visit.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: millions go to Central Park in New York City, Presidio in San Francisco and 100's of other city parks around the world, i have never visited one that i was over whelmed with what is there. Elche contains the best free municipal parks i have enjoyed.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Only a small garden, but absolutely immaculate to wander round, with an outstanding area of cacti. We were impressed with Elche in general, but this garden really was the high point of the visit.
I would agree with several other reviews that the signage could be improved on, if you are not a botanical wizard it's a bit confusing as to what you are looking at sometimes.
There is a small souvenir shop which sells cold drinks which was welcome in the heat. Entry cost 5 euros / person which was a little pricey.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We didn't know what to expect and were amazed by this iImmaculately kept garden, one of the best I have ever been to. The specialisation as you would expect in Elche are palms but they also had a great collection of Cacti. Everything was well laid out. They could improve on the signage on some of the plants.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
I'm really not sure what to make of this place. Some elements were lovely, others disappointing.

I had emailed in advance to let them know I wouldn't be arriving until really late. Check-in was quite smooth, but when I got to my room it was like a sauna. Clearly the air con was not working, so back to reception. By now someone else was checking in, so had to wait 10 mins. Explained the problem, and they sent a handy man to the room, who didn't seem the most clued up individual, and eventually confirmed what I had told them - it was broken !! So back to reception again. Other 10 minutes waiting for another customer to be served, before finally getting a different room over an hour after I'd first arrived.
Despite not getting into my new room until after 1am, when I asked for a late check out, was bluntly told no.

The rooms are okay. I couldn't work out they were tatty or rustic .. I think probably a bit of both. I will say the bed was lovely and comfortable, and big.

I didn't have any food, so comment on that.

The pool area was very nice, but the pool itself somewhat chilly.

Checked out and asked about a bus to the airport, as I had plenty of time. Was sent to completely the wrong place, so ended up walking a four mile round trip, to get to a bus stop that was 5 minutes away the hotel !!
If you do want to get an airport bus, go to the stop at junction of Juan Carlos and Calle De Daoiz. It really is just a few minutes walk from the hotel and then takes about 30 minutes the airport, and cost only 1.5 Euros. Theres only one an hour. Bus 1B !!
Just to warn you there's no info at the bus stop about that service, but it does stop there.
How hotel staff don't know where to get an airport bus is beyond me.

As for Elche itself, I liked it, although was only there for a day. It's got a lovely Spanish feel, despite its proximity to alicante. Not a British pub in sight thank god.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: In the heart of the historic city of Elche this sublime botanical garden is dedicated to the palm and other Mediterranean and desert plants. Small enough to get around and see most if it in half an hour. Lots of people do but thats to miss the point of this place. My advice? Go early evening as the heat is going out of the day, wander slowly among the beautifully tended plants nad trees, soak up the calm and serene atmosphere. You will not regret a single moment spent in this special place. Then pop across the road for a drink on the deck of the bar in the HOtel Huerta del Cura.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: An oasis of calm in a busy city
conteudo:
Whilst staying inland with friends we visited Elche to see these gardens. They cover only 13,000 square metres, but within that area over 1000 palm trees grow. In addition other species such as lemon, orange and pomegranate can be found.

The pathways meander around the park, past ponds and small waterfalls. The Imperial palm tree is well over 100 years old - apparently is was mentioned in Baedekers Tourist Guide in 1908!

You can rush round and see a lot in twenty minutes. But far better to stay and drink in the peace and tranquility, take your time, look at the various species and relax. Small children can be kept entertained by the ponds, watching the pond life quietly.

This park is worth a visit. I intend to come again. And the bar next door serves good tapas and sandwiches.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We visited Elche during our holidays in Alicante. Our travel guide book recommended Elche as having UNESCO listed palm tree forrest. We got a bus from Alicante (which cost 2-3 euros). I would recommend to go the Tourist information there to collect map and ask for recommendations (as it is a huge place). Then if you do not have time to walk all around Elche - just go straight to this place. It is a summary of all palm tree forrest. Not a very big place - but so nice, calm, tidy, beautiful. I highly recommend that place.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Palm trees - the pride of Elche - cacti and beyond Even an albino peacock that was starting down on us as we approached the gate. Place full of history and must see if you are in town or nearby

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Still as good when last here
conteudo:
Stayed here for 3 days prior to flight home was very relaxing even got rained on 2nd day sitting next to pool under a parasol reading for 30mins slight breeze made things pleasant.
Room was large and well cleaned every day, plenty of seats and tables ,storage good with small fridge,good bathroom goodies and a (bidet) air condition works well although the control had a slight rattle. did not eat here liked going out for meals.
Reception had a slight problem with our passports and there reading machine, but they did resolve after a good few minutes. Car was parked in the underground car park so cool when needed but 13 euro per day.
The great thing is the hotel is in the center of Elche and shops and restuarants are all within 15 mins walking so yes we will be back.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
We visited the gardens as part of a day in Elche. We parked in the underground car park SABA at Cases Mare de D√©u, 03202 Elche. It has very good clean loos and is right next to the tourist information kiosk. The tourist officer gave us a booklet and leaflets of recommended places to visit. He suggested we visit the Basilica Santa Maria first and then catch the road train, which took in the Municipal Park, the El Huerto del Curo and the Palm Grove. This was excellent advice. Whilst waiting for the train we walked through the Municipal Park, which offered shade under the many and varied trees and plants. We boarded the train just outside the Park (& Tourist info office) and it set off through the park where we got a multi-lingual commentary. The train then took us through the streets to the El Huerto del Curo. The train stops about 100 metres from the gardens. We alighted and planned our visit to last an hour so we could get on the next train and finish the tour. The gardens, which are relatively small (13,000 sq mts) are an amazing collection of cacti, palm and citrus trees, flowers, terrapins, carp and peacocks.
For your ‚Ç¨5 admission you get a useful guide book and a numbered walking route so you don‚Äôt miss anything. At the end of the walk there is a well-stocked shop with reasonably priced refreshments. You can stay as long as you want and there are plenty of seats where you can chill out.
We left and hopped back on the road train which then trundled along to the Palm Grove. You can walk or cycle through the palms but it was very hot and the terrain in places looked uneven so we let the train take the strain. The train affords you a good view of many of the 200,000 trees. On returning to the tourist office we looked for a nice caf√© and can recommend Cerveceria La Surena in Plaza Congreso Eucaristico, which is opposite the Basilica Santa Maria.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Thousands of palm tree variations - the best horticultural garden I have been to this far.

On your stroll around the garden you may bump into a few peacocks who colour the garden some more.

Entrance is 3.50 euros if u are staying at Huerto Del Cura and 5 Euro otherwise.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Lovely and relaxing place, with many kind of palms and other plants. Good to take a walk here and spend some time relaxing. There are some part that seems forgotten but mostly are good.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: I am lucky to say I come for work, though this is an ideal place to stay if you were on holiday in Elche. The staff and restaurant is above class. The rooms are a great size within the palms. They have a spa for massaged sauna which makes my work more enjoyable after a long day. The town centre is only a few streets walk away.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Tourist train saves the walk in the heat. The garden is only a couple of minutes walk from the museum.
The Imperial Palm Tree -the 'vegetable candelabra' is of course the main attraction but the garden is full of horticultural 'eye candy'
A place to sit and relax before you head back up to town on the tourist train to visit the MAHE and Altamira Palace.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Had a walk around these beautiful gardens this afternoon. Very peaceful and lots of lovely plants and palm trees.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: There are few so beautifull gardens on the world. If you can to Elche, you cannot miss this treasure.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Weird, Wonderful, Spiky, Dates - an oasis of cool on a hot day!
conteudo:
I have gait/walking challenges (stroke), all sightseeing has to be well-researched and not overly taxing; I wear a legbrace. A short walk from the centre, the Huerto del Cura (The Priest's Garden), declared a National Artistic Garden, is like an oasis in the middle of built-up spaces and buildings. Serene ponds and fountains, I liked the Bust of Dame de Elche, nestling by the side of pool - very calming on a hot day. As you go further into the garden, there're stepping stones across a pond, very helpful signage for identifying trees; there are seat benches to sit and cool off ‚Äì very peaceful.

Bring hats/caps, water, comfy shoes for walking. It's hard, stony ground in some areas, but walkable. Cacti gardens; amazing variety. Weird, wonderful Imperial Palm (Palmera Imperial) has 7 arms growing from a single trunk, like a candlelabra. Roaming around the gardens are peacocks, calling to one another ‚Äì sure wakes you up! Great experience, cool oasis of calm and peace.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: On a day visit to Elche which we thoroughly enjoyed visiting, we ended up at these gardens. Delightful surprise, very well kept area, lots and lots of plants and palm trees and a famous 7 branch palm tree. It is not an enormous garden but big enough, we are not garden experts so we didn't look at the name of every plant. What was lovely is the peace, the serenity, in the middle of a city. At 5 euros it was worth every penny/euro. By the way you get your photo taken as you go in, yes very touristy but you know what i bought it, i was very pleased with my 5 euro magnet and photo. Regret a bit now i didnt take the keyring as well. Don't miss a visit !

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: One for keen gardeners but beware of the ticket man
conteudo: THe priests palm and cactus garden is nice enough, and very well kept, but perhaps best for someone's who really wants to see the labels on different kinds of trees. I had walked all over the city with my map to find this and before I even got inside, I fell foul of the furious man in the ticket booth. THere were only a handful of people in the garden so surely he can't have been overwhelmed by the stress of it. He came to the window from the back of the room, and told me off in a torrent of fast Spanish -after I had managed to say I did not speak Spanish - for putting coins in a ticket stile against advice from a complicated notice which was not obvious unless you looked for it - and read Spanish well. Maybe he has not got his head round the idea of having foreign visitors? Not a great start. A young man seemed to be taking photos of the scene behind me at the entrance and later I found he was doing it to sell key rings with the faces of visitors photographed as they came in. I should have said yes to mine for the record of the fright and embarrassment that was probably still on my face. It always baffles me when someone like this is convinced that a tourist is making a mistake on purpose to upset them.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This garden highlights the treasure that the Palmeral is to Europe and Elche. It is a fine botanical garden, but an exceptional exhibit of a grand palmier, and it includes an excellent cactii collection.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
I stayed here many times a class hotel with fantastic palms tree gardens
small bungalow bedrooms all dotted in the gardens
Lovley pool always a bit cold
I also stay in their sister hotel milenio
You see the lady owner she checks everything every day
She's on it that's why they are so good
Also the staff have been there for years

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Interesting to a point, but ultimately this garden has little to offer to those who don't value date palms.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Beautiful gardens with a staggering amount of curiously grown palm trees, its name is the Curates garden so a lot of religious connections but it makes it interesting. Whilst on the tour you probably won't notice that a video is being made, at the end of the tour you go to a cinema room and watch a video, little knowing that you will be on it, opportunity to buy it at the end of the screening 2.5euros - cheap!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: this a fascinating gardens which in the heat of the summer was cool and refreshing. With the machines available you could hear in your own language the history of the various plants and palms, how they either arrived at its name or postilion within the gardens.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Awesome collection of palm trees and cactuses
conteudo: I have to admit that I did not know about the Huerto del Cura before coming to Elche, therefore I was amazed to find such an awesome collection of palm trees and cactuses. Absolutely worth the visit.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We visited for a weekend and this park was the very best Elche had to offer. We loved it so. Much we visited twice despite the entry costing 5 euros. I would definitely recommend it to anybody visiting this lovely town.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Elche has a lot of different huertos but this is the most well preserved. It is a nice place to visit and relax in a hot summer day in Elche and you can find different kinds of trees in a nice and lovely area.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: In a unique setting in the center of ELCHE is this garden of palm trees, cacti. It is well maintained offering a cool and shady respite during the summer. Most of the palm trees and cacti are labeled. The jewel of the garden is the Imperial Palm Tree which is shaped like a candelabra. Within this small garden are sculptures, a rock garden with various types of cacti, ponds and a small chapel. Parking is across the street in the hotel parking lot. There is a small fee for the parking and entrance to the garden.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: well worth the visit to see the extraordinary collection of palm trees from around the world
conteudo: Beuatifully maintaniled and landscaped gardens that are tranquil and cool especially when the open at 10am

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Located in Elche town (Elx). Easy to reach By Cercan√≠as C1 train from Alicante train station to Elche Parque station, it takes 26 minutes. Huerto del Cura is perhaps the most famous and beautiful park of Elche Palm Groves, which are Unesco World Heritage Place. You will find the most unique Palm tree there, The Imperial Palm Tree with seven suckers/branches from the same trunk.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: The types of fruit trees are impressive. We walked and enjoyed the breeze. The grounds are well maintained. I recommend getting a cappuccino at the resturant right outside the park.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Elche is palm groves, palm trees wherever you look. this beautiful, relaxing town has this to offer in addition to the UNESCO Huerto del Cura. This garden has some of the tallest and oldest trees including the Imperial palm tree and also other tropical plants and cactus. Well worth a visit.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Vigilar los ladrones del parking! Watch out for the thieves at the parking
conteudo:
El jard√≠n est√° muy bonito con tortugas, peces, pavos reales (tambi√©n blancos) y plantas muy lindas. Pero en el parking de al lado nos podr√≠an haber robado todo del coche, han abierto y han mirado las cosas, parece que no nos quitaron nada a nosotros pero no dejar nada de valor all√≠. O a√∫n mejor, no deje el coche all√≠.

The garden is very beautiful with turtles, fish, peacocks (also white) and very beautiful plants. But in the parking lot next to it, they could have stolen everything out our car, the thieves have opened and have looked at the things, it seems they did not remove anything from us but do not to leave anything of value there. Or better yet, don't even park there.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This beautiful little park is declared a World Heritage Site by UNESCO. It was an extremely hot day when we visited and arrived just after it opened at 10a.m. It was lovely to walk around in the shade of these magnificent palms and huge cactus all coming into flower. The first thing I caught sight of was a beautiful White Peacock and the second was a Peahen with her chicks - I have never seen peacock chicks before and there were several Peahens with their chicks - very sweet. Ponds with fish and terrapins all very peaceful and lovely, A Shop and small nursery when you leave where you can purchase souvenirs and lovely dates. It was quite beautiful.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Fabulous gardens right in the city very well worth a visit.The most amazing palms and cacti a beautiful oasis.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: 5‚Ç¨ for adults. Lots of Palm trees and some peacock chicks. Mini water features with frogs and turtles. A cooler place to be on a hot day

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Small attractive garden full of different types of palm trees, many dedicated to notable figures either in history or film and planted by them. A good place to picnic.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Fantastic well manicured garden of palms and cacti
conteudo: We came to this garden on a cruise ship tour from Cartegena. We spent an hour in the garden and could have spent more. We had a guided tour that increased the value of the experience. There is a (5 euro/ 3 euro concession) if you are on your own. The trees and plants are spectacular so make sure you have your camera. This is a must see if you are in southern Spain.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: hotel has beautiful, lush grounds, large pool, cabana-like hotel rooms and great breakfast. As well, a wonderful sunday brunch in the restaurant. I stayed two nights for a wedding over palm sunday weekend and would recommend the hotel.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Very interesting place for a walk. Entry fee for adult is ‚Ç¨5
I recommend to explore and find all hidden places.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A peaceful place in the city
conteudo: I would definately recommend to visit this lovely and very peaceful botanical garden. They have some amazing plants and even peacocks walking around.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Just because of beauty of plants
conteudo:
We came to the garden by car and it was very hard to find parking place although it was low season. We found a very tight place for a car just by the garden where is a small parking lot.

The garden is like a green oasis with all palms, cactuses, pond, animals and other plants. It gives nice shade in a sunny day. Area is not so big and easily walked through in an hour. The best part with kids was a pond with turtles and birds. Also cactuses and palms are gorgeous. Other parts are bit boring offering nothing really interesting than an atmosphere.

Whole area is easily accessible by prams and wheelchair. There are toilets and cafe/souvenir kiosk. The reason to came here is just a great scene of all these trees and plants. Unfortunately we didn't go into Parque El Palmeral which you should check also.

We tried also find a lunch place in Elche but it was really hard. There was only cafes and couple of not so good looking restaurants around the square in city center.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: The gardens are beautifully kept they include lots of tropical varieties of trees. It is free to enter, the irrigation system is quite unusual.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A tranquil haven, worth visiting to view the amazing Palm Trees
conteudo: We love visiting Elche, shopping at the shoe factory and being amazed at all the leather goods on sale. A short drive away are these gardens which offer a tranquil oasis where you can sit and admire the lovely gardens

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: It is actually the only place in Elche where you are supposed to pay for seeing palm trees. There is one special shaped palm tree here, and the garden is surely nice, but you can get the same visiting the municipal park after ten minutes walking and there it is free of charge.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
In the middle of this garden is a palm tree with a difference. From a main trunk, eight separate trunks or limbs shoot off at different angles to make eight palm trees, this is quite impressive as I have never seen this anywhere else. Unfortunately there are only seven now as due to weight one branch fell off.

Around the grounds are nice ponds and waterfalls and everywhere of course Bird of Paradise flowers. There is also a small shop where you can buy trinkets etc.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A stroll admiring God's handiwork in palm trees and various types of cactuses
conteudo: As part of a world heritage site this park is beautiful. It is an oasis of peace (except for the class of elementary school kids who were slightly ahead of us :-) !!) in the middle of a lovely city. Priced at 5‚Ç¨ per adult (the audioguide being extra) it seems just a tad bit overpriced. If one is part of a group (min. 20) then the admission price is drastically reduced (2,80‚Ç¨ I think). Still strolling the park, admiring the various types of palm trees and the cactuses was an hour well spent.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: I never realised there were so many different types of palm trees, fascinating. I liked the way it was set out and easy to walk round. It's amazing how old some of these palms are. There is a section of cacti which is interesting too. A must visit if you are in Elche. Only disappointment was there was nowhere to sit and drink your coffee!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: What a beautiful garden in a city centre! Not a large space but a true haven of peace. Excellent array of exotic plants, water gardens and sculpture with a historical content too. This was the main purpose of our visit to the Alicante area and we were delighted to have our expectations fully realised. This is truly a must-see if you are visiting Spain in the Costa Blanca or surrounding areas.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This is a garden that can be visited over and over again. We live 40 minutes drive away in a coastal town and it is always a joy to visit. You can park in the Hotel Huerto del Cura just across the road (you have to pay of course) and you can use the Hotel bar and restaurant if you wish. On this occasion we were staying in the Hotel for a special occasion and spent one morning in these famous gardens just across the road.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Excelente y relajante.Exelant and relaxed place
conteudo:
Bonito lugar, Buena comida, excelente lugar para descansar.
Lo recomiendo.

Nice place to stay, wonderful and relaxing.
Good food and beautiful views.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: It was really worthwhile to spend an hour or so in this oasis of green when so much of the area is just scrubland and near desert.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Great Hotel in the heart of Elche
conteudo:
This hotel is good for business as well as tourist's, it has a pool, nice rooms and plenty of space to relax, just a short walk from the town, here you can find bars restaurants etc.
The staff are friendly and polite and the rooms are quite large and very clean with AC when needed.
The breakfast in nice, but the restaurant in the evening although very good is just a bit basic... but with lots of great restaurants near by you will have no problem with food.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This can be a little difficult to find but do persevere. Only 13,000sq metres in size it has a huge range of species on display, as well as the ubiquitous 1,000 odd palms. Peaceful, shaded and surprisingly uncrowded it is a gorgeous spot to while away at least an hour. Of course it is more of a creation than the mny other Huertos in this town of several hundred thousand palm trees but this only serves to add to its beauty. Well worth seeking out.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Great hotel, in a great position. Staff are excellent and everything is clean and tidy. The surroundings are beautiful and the food excellent.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Rare collection of Palms and Cactis in the heart of Elche
conteudo:
This is a must see attraction if you are in the area. For a very small fee you are transported into a very peaceful world of over a thousand palms and cactus all set in beautifully landscaped gardens with ponds, bridges and a signposted walkway.
Allow about an hour to to see it all, more if you want to sit and relax amongst the majestic palms. Here you will find the famous 'Kings Palm' which sprouted 7 suckers after a short period of growth, now fully supported by a sturdy metal frame. The dates from this palm were reportedly supplied only to the Royal Household.
There is also a magnificent display of giant Cactus which are best observed from the bridge over the pond.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Silence, perpetual greenery, flowers, pools and streams and, of course, palms, thousands of them, and in hundreds of shapes and sizes. Only the traffic noise at some points will remind you that you're in downtown Elche, not the Garden of Eden.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: What a place ! We went to visit after seeing the recommendation on here. One of the most peaceful places that I have been to. Beautiful landscaping so unlike any garden you would find in other Spanish parks. We had a 3 year old who loved looking at the turtles fish and peacocks. I will be going back in the very near future.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Visited here in August with my partner. We both enjoyed walking around (which took around an hour at a very leisurely pace). Plenty of different palms and cacti to look at and a few ornamental ponds and water features dotted about with fish and terrapins in.
Lots of places to chill out in the shade too and just take in the peaceful surroundings. There's also,a little gift shop area selling cacti and touristy gifts. It didn't seem very expensive either.
The only thing that I didn't like was that as we entered the gardens we had a woman almost dive on us to take a photo (this was to try and sell you a key ring as you left), also there seemed to be an excessive amount of rubbish bins in the garden (getting in the way of my touristy photos lol).
All in all a worthwhile look round and happy we did it

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
A very good place, only took about an hour to look around. Many varieties of palms and cacti set in beautiful surroundings. Lovely gift shop and the dates are gorgeous.

While in Elche walk into the city centre for some beautiful buildings, cafes and bars.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: There is an extensive variety of palms in the garden with a nice shady walk through the trees. Several water features. Imperial Palm Tree very impressive. The trail is numbered but the guide handed out would be more informative with a trail or one line description about some of the more significant trees. There is a building to the left as you enter the gardens with palm trunks used as pillars to support the structure and Palm trees have also been used to provide decorative ceiling joists. 5‚Ç¨ for adults, half price for under 16s. Worth a visit if In the area and like greenery.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
easy walking through this amazing garden! Plenty of spots to sit, and restroom facilities.
Little snack bar and gift shop as well.
Glad they had placards saying what types of trees/flowers they were.
Peacocks on site!
beautiful day, highly recommended

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: By far, the charmest and nicest hotel in Elche. Having your room in the middle of a tropical garden isn't a bad idea, is it? A lovely swimming pool, an excellent restaurant and all of these features a few meters away to the city centre. However, a full renovation of bedrooms and common areas is needed. Bathrooms are out-fashioned, and doesn't fit well in the hotel fees....

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Beautiful, but a tourist trap. Five euros to get in, but kids are free. Its understandable for the upkeep.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: a little bit expensive_5 ‚Ç¨ an adult, a very beautiful garden, we did a lot of beautiful pictures. Our daughter liked running near the ponds and watching peacocks and fish

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Elche is about a one hour drive from Benidorm. We wanted to visit the garden, which is a well publicised tourist attraction. Elche has the largest concentration of palm trees, estimated at between 200 and 300 thousand. The Huerto is a small to medium plot of land where palm trees are grown. Each Huerto is named after it's owner and this one was owned by the priest or chaplain,Jose Castano Sanchez.

The park is very well laid out, considering it's relatively small size of 13,000 square metres. Entry is 5 Euros per adult and comes with a small guide book in your language. There are not just palm trees. There is a cacti area and water features as well as many colourful flowers and birds.

The much publicised lily pond was not in evidence. I have no idea why and it was a little disappointing but it is still a beautiful place none the less. There are some peacocks, both the brightly coloured variety and some white ones. There is also a toilet block and a small stall selling souvenirs and date products. All in all, an enjoyable half day out.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Thoroughly enjoyed this garden. It was well organised, well maintained and offered a tranquil atmosphere amongst the puzzle of the city!!! Highly recommend

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Huerto is a small plot of land planted with palm trees in Elche and typically named after its owner.

Huerto del Cura is a beautiful park not to be missed when in Elche. Although it is relatively small at about 13 square meters, about 1000 trees are planted here. There is also a lake with ducks, a cactus section and some fruit trees like lemon, orange and pomegranate. We saw peacocks and other birds too.

The highlight of Huerto del Cura is the Imperial Palm Tree. It has eight arms, which normally grow from the base of a palm tree but on this Imperial Palm Tree, they grew out of the top of a single main trunk.

It is nice to stroll inside as it very peaceful and quiet. Entrance fee is a bit on the high side though at ‚Ç¨5.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Huerto del cura offers a very nice hotel amidst a beautiful garden.
It is an Oasis of Palm trees and many more tropical species. Green heaven. Very nice to visit as an attraction and much more to stay an overnight.
The pool is nice.
The restaurant is good tipical spanish style. Slow service but nice food.
Shahar

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Lovely hotel mixing modern with antique styles. Rooms are small cabanas, breaks the mold of the awful Spanish Coast Line. In the middle of a palm tree garden. Nice swimming pool. Excellent restaurant.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: If you are in town and want to see or do something - its the place to go. You will pay 5euro per face. And can easily spend 40 min wathing trees. Dont get me wrong - it sure is a nice garden!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
I don't really like gardens that much. The only thing I like about Wisely RHS is the playground and having picnics. I never liked the plants.
My Mum and Dad forced me to go. I'm glad I went. It was amazing. We saw loads of Bird of Paradises.
I really liked the stepping stones. They are so fun. They are quite big and close together so it's more hard to fall in.
The most amazing thing is the palm tree with 8 trunks!
At the end there is a beautiful water fountain. All the water comes out of a enormous shell.
At the end we had are favourite ice cream.
When you first come in someone will take a photo of you. Make sure you smile.
When you leave you can go and get a key ring, a calendar or a fridge magnet with your picture on it.
I had a brilliant day.
Jasmina ( age 8 )

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: For tropical garden lovers, this is a must see, use a few hours to look good around and do not forget the cacti....

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Loved these gardens which you pay a small charge to enter. Very peaceful as few other visitors when we were there. Very well tended with lots of palms ( obviously) but lots of other interesting plants. Places to sit and ponds with fish and terapins. Bread provided for feeding. A small gift shop where we bought some good quality mugs.
A lovely couple of hours spent here.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
After seeing many other sites in Elche for 1 or 2 euros we were very surprised to find this at 5euros per adult. Although it is a nice park it did seem overpriced as it takes only an hour to see it all.
Could do with a little cafe for coffee and better service at the entry point.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Palm trees galore and lots of cacti and ponds, statues and fountains. We also saw some peacocks there,it was a red hot day when we visited here,but it was very cool and shady in this park. Well worth a visit.It was 5 euros per person to enter the park.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
If you like parks and gardens then this will appeal to you. There are various areas to see including a cactus garden, little ponds, stream etc. A nice way to spend an hour.
Work seeing the 7 trunked palm tree

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: If you are in or around Alicante, do yourself a favor and take a short train ride to the west to the city of Elche and find this gem of a garden. Water fountains, well-kept walkways and a great variety of plants, including the impressive Imperial Palm ‚Äì 7 palms in one. We enjoyed watching the peacock chicks trailing their mother through the brush. On a hot day, we enjoyed the ice cream available from the kiosk.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Different ,with all those palm trees,so many varieties!!!! Very special place! Walking distance from town!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: There is a small entrance fee to get into this garden, but it is worth it as it is very well maintained. The various cacti are amazing and the palm trees are stunning. We sat on one of the benches for a few minutes and listened to the birds and the sound of the lake, it was beautiful. There is a shop near the entrance if you want to purchase reminders.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
A small charge, but worth it. A beautiful garden with a large selection of different palm trees.
An improvement would be to have a little cafe, but they do have a kiosk selling drinks & ice creams.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Very good situated in walking distance of the city, but you feel like you are in a rural setting. Lovely rooms with good facilities

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: The palm forest is a must in Elche
conteudo: We always make it a point to visit this attraction in Elche when we visit. The setting is calming and serine. They have palms from around the word and a great duck pond.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Interesting and impressive, but much smaller than anticipated
conteudo: With a 3* must visit in the Michelin Green guide, I was expecting something special. The quality is there, but the gardens are really quite small and surrounded by busy roads, which mars the overall ambiance. Enjoyed the Cacti and Terrapins as much as anything else. 5 euros felt quite a lot for the size of the gardens.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Such a treasure. Well worth an amble around. Would love to repeat the experience.
Peace and tranquility in stunning surroundings.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We arrived by bus from Alicante and soon discovered that the whole of Elche is a palm garden. Palms are everywhere but there is a special artistic garden which has been laid out with palms, cactus and water features that provide a spectacular setting. We walked down to the Elche visitor centre from the bus station and found a small road train that left on the hour and stopped at the Garden and picked you up later on any half hour. The garden is signposted with about 25 view points and has seating to allow you to take in the various sights. Took a lot of photos which included the ducks and terrapins lazing in the water. The noddy train was 2 Euros for over 65s and the garden was similarly priced

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: One of our favourite day trips this palm garden has surprises round every turn. Beautiful palms in a garden setting with under planting of strelitzia, agapanthus etc., with bourganvillias trained into sunshades and by one of the very large water features a large slope is planted with succulents and cacti from different regions of the world. The lake has small islands on which terrapins sun bath and annoy the water birds. The most spectacular part of the garden are the palms many dedicated to famous Spaniards and European royalty, one has divided into eight trunks and stands alone which makes it all the more unique. One of the many copies of the Dama del Elche is, at this time, standing on a water feature not far from the small shop part of which is also the admission gate. We tend to take a picnic with us as it's so relaxing and peaceful to sit on a bench overlooking the lake having lunch (much to the amusement of the non British visitors)! The palms of Elche were originally planted by the Phoenicians some 2,500 years ago and the huerta is part of the palm forest which has been enclosed into a garden. Parking is a problem as much of the area has narrow roads with no parking but parking can be found within a small walk of the garden. There is a choice of souveniers in the shop but we always take away with a a small fig cake very good if you have a sweet tooth!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
in the heart of Elxe in Spain is this beautiful palm park with over 200,000 palms! It's quite breath-taking with palms from Europe, the Americas, Australia & ASia. It was named after Jose Csstano who owned it till 1918. From squat cacti to umbrella ferns to a literal tall cactus tree to an eight armed palm--it's a wonderful sight.
Then go for a drink - or food - opposite at the fabulous Hotel Huerto del Cura!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: we spent a wonderful week relaxing by the pool , drinking delicious cocktails and enjoying the local sights , the hotel staff were very friendly , rooms lovely and clean ..a pleasure.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
We stayed for a week and after some initial problems with a member of staff (receptionist), which was sorted out quickly, professionally, and competently by the Manager Xavier Martinez, we had a great time at the hotel, IF of course you‚Äôre looking for some rest, some sun and some peace. Though do take heed of the comments on here, that at the weekends in the summer there is a lot of noise through weddings/other functions etc, and this can have a knock on effect with the swimming pool facilities and kids throwing things at each other, so watch out for the water balloons!!!
During the week it is a quiet place, and most people around the pool are very respectful to one another, so next time, me and my partner would ideally arrive Sunday evening and leave Saturday morning before the madness of the weekend functions start.
But overall thoroughly enjoyed it! Keep up the Good Work Xavier!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Combine this trip with the palm museum over the road and the MAHE museum just along the street. Good on a hot day for some al fresco chilling

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: I loved this place. Date & nature lovers - you must go!!
conteudo: When I say date I do mean the squishy delicious sticky fruit. This place is full of date palms! And the finest of them all, the Imperial Palm which has 8 palms to it. It's beautiful. It's a little oasis in the middle of Elche. We saw passion flowers, agave cactus, bird of paradise flowers, roses, a peacock and peahen, beautiful mandarin ducks, koi carp, aloe vera, date palms, cacti... the list goes on. It was ‚Ç¨5 each for both me and my husband but well worth it. I loved every second of it. Oh, and there are toilet facilities which were perfectly decent too.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: A beautiful oasis in a busy city
conteudo: Whenever I travel to Costa Blanca, I make a point of going inland to Elche to visit this little gem of a garden. Set in the city of palms, its centrepiece is the Imperial Palm, a candelabra of eight offspring surrounding the parent tree, weighing in at about eight tons. It is over 160 years old. There are ponds with turtles bobbing about and interesting sculptures. The garden is not the easiest place to find, but travelling from the coast westward, follow the signs for the city centre and the hotel of the same name. There is on-street parking nearby, particularly near the police station. It is a very relaxing place, and a good escape from the heat of the sun. There is a shop selling drinks and snacks, with free Wifi, but no cafe, although there is a convenient, if somewhat ordinary cafe next door. Entry fee was only ‚Ç¨5 for an adult, with discounts for pensioners and children.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: This is a lovely small park named after la Reina Sofia. It is beautifully laid out with small lakes and grassy areas. There are many water fowl and peacocks and the waters are full of coloured carp and small terrapins. There is also a small cafe and an area for outdoor concerts. It is a very pleasant and picturesque area.We always visit here after going to the large Wednesday market.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
Visited this beautiful garden in mid April. We did not find it easily - had to find the tourist office
in Elche first for directions as the gardens are in the city centre - but well worth the
effort. Wish we had had more time to look round the lovely city centre surrounded by palm trees We also walked around the attractive municipal park. Free parking was available by the railway station and we walked into the city from there - just a few minutes walk.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
We have been to this lovely palm garden about ten times and seen it in sunshine and rain and every season. It never fails to charm. It is quite small in reality , but is so cleverly laid out that it seems quite large. There are different types of palm from all over the world, but the main one is the Imperial palm with a trunk divided into eight branches. It is full of water features with all attendant plant life and animals. There are lovely peacocks , mandarin ducks and baby terrapins. They look cute , but could remove your finger with their sharp bite. There are many golden, white, bronze and scarlet carp in the smaller pools.The cacti too are absolutely stunning. They are massive and when in flower must be wonderful though we have never been there at the right time to see this.There is a small, thatched shop selling souvenirs and one may hire a commentary on the garden talking about the plants and the history of the garden
All this is presided over by a model of La Dama de Elche. If in the area of Elche you really must go it will restore your calm and sanity after the impossible task of finding a parking spot.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Beautiful peaceful Garden, that all family can enjoy and refreshingly cool in the Alicante sun.
conteudo: This is a beautiful Garden, full of beautiful plants particularly Palms and Cactus. A lovely cooling and peaceful place to spend an hour or too. Don't rush the experience. I went with my teenage daughters and husband and we all enjoyed it's tranquility and sculptural surprises. Take a camera the plant shapes are so lovely to photograph. The imperial Palm is a quirk of nature propped up my mans determination to support something different.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Relaxing Oasis and nice to see
conteudo: Our friends brought us here whilst visiting Elche, both my wife and I enjoyed the park with all it's different Palm tree's and water features and theres a wonderful calming sculpture, the Emperor palm with its support rings is well worth a photograph or two, and as always, there is a shop where you can buy souveniers of your visit. Not really for younger children, more adulty but in my opinion, well worth the price of admission, give it a try if you are in the area.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Interesting to visit. A pleasant afternoon can be had wandering around the garden and enjoying the plants and trees.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
I had business at the nearby University, and stayed here on their recommendation.

The reception area and restaurant are all modern. The restaurant, named ELS CAPELLANS, is worth considering on its own behalf, and reviewed separately, but recommended.

The rooms are in an array of one story cottages, in a walled campus filled with palm trees. While not so new, the furnishings are fine and the plumbing modern and everything works well, including the free WIFI that covers rooms and the other parts of the campus.

There's a breakfast room off the pool area. About my only complaint is the coffee machine there that's one of these big units that supposedly makes espresso. An interesting assortment of meats, cheeses, eggs and the usual stuff - I like the hearts of palm in the setting. A very cheerful man manages the buffet and makes sure that it never gets out of arrangement.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
It's a rather small park of palm trees - saved from disaster when the Moors left Elche/Elx in 1200 and something.

A lovely atmosphere and very calming. The ducks and the terrapins were fun too. The dates and turron from the little shop were great too.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: We have visited the Huerta del Cura several times, usually taking people visiting us in Spain there as part of a day in Elche. It is a haven of tranquility and, on a hot day, is a perfect place to find some shade for an hour or two. The audio guide you can hire is well worth it on a first visit. We particularly like the cactus garden and, just in front of it, the pools with ducks, huge carp and terrapins (turtles).

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: beautiful garden, shade in a hot spot
conteudo: beauitiful garden in the middle of the famous palm groves in Elche. Well taken care of, despite the continous drouhgt in the part of Spain.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Copy of la dama de elche and animals in the pools give extra interest to this outstanding botanical garden; the cafe and shop are quirky with interesting staff to talk to too.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Extremly nice and calm place to visit
conteudo: The Huerto del Cura gardens are indeed worth a visit. It is small but packed with Palm trees and an excellent collection of cactus. I belive you won't see anything like it anywhere in the world. Even in mid July, it was not crowded at all. You can relax in the shade of the many trees and you can even buy species or seeds. Contrary to what is written in other reviews, the garden is very easy to find (well signposted from the main roads) and parking was extremly easy. Just opposite the garden entrance is the Hotel Huerto del Cura. Here you will find parking areas. From 12 to 17.30 the parking is free. Entrance is only 5 EUR for adults and 3 EUR for studens. All in all a very rewarding visit. Fantastic photo oppotunities.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
titulo: Hard to find, impossible to park.
conteudo: For the second time we decided to try and find the palm gardens. After locating the area of Elche that it is in, (there are no signs, its a guessing game), we found it impossible to park. We went round and round the city looking for the car parks and they were either full or the entrance was well hidden. This attraction is impossible to visit by car so we give up.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo:
... except for the school party!

Pleasant little park of palm trees and ponds. A good place to be if it is hot.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: A peaceful oasis of so many different kinds of palm trees, many that are very old. You could spend the whole day here. Somebody takes your photograph as you enter, which can be off-putting - but when you come out of the gardens you see that you have been put onto a key chain!! Of course you buy it!!

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: Elche abounds in Palm trees, but Huerto del Cura is a fascinating corner, take at least an hour or two to walk and enjoy this relaxing and interesting spot. It's not Kew Gardens, but it is very natural....an oasis. While in Elche have a Rice Dish un Arroz really good! Palm Sunday in Elche is their special day VERY BUSY.

estabelecimento: Jard√≠n Art√≠stico Nacional Huerto Del Cura - Elche
conteudo: very pretty, serene and photogenic. 5 euros entrance, nice gift shop

titulo: Un trozo de la historia bien conservado!!
conteudo:
En una Bas√≠lica muy bonita, muy bien conservada, tiene un hermoso organo. Se puede entrar gratis y para subir al campanario se paga 2‚Ç¨ los adultos y 1‚Ç¨ los ni√±os.
El campanario tiene 170 escalones con varios reyanos donde sol√≠a vivir el campanero y al llegar arriba hay unas espectaculares vista de la hermosa ciudad de Elche con sus bellas palmeras.
Para conocer la historia hay que visitar todos estos sitios.
No quer√≠amos irnos de Elche sin entrar en la bas√≠lica. La verdad es que nos sorprendi√≥ mucho porque est√° bastante bien conservada y el tanto el altar como el √≥rgano son una pasada.
Es incre√≠ble lo alta que es la bas√≠lica y lo bien conservada y cuidada. El altar es muy bonito y todo preparado para la representaci√≥n del Misteri d'Elx
Bas√≠lica de nuestra se√±ora de la Asunci√≥n, patrona de la ciudad. De dimensiones medias, destaca la c√∫pula por donde baja el √°ngel en la representaci√≥n del misteri.
La bas√≠lica tiene su importancia porque se celebra el Misteri d'Elx, fiesta declarada Patrimonio de la Humanidad.

titulo: Excelente, mucha historia en poco espacio.
conteudo: Un lugar muy bello, muy hist√≥rico, con detalles espec√≠ficos de los siglos que han pasado y de la historia de la ciudad.

titulo: Bas√≠lica escenario del Misteri de Elche
conteudo: Templo cat√≥lico m√°s importante de la ciudad, de estilo Barroco construido durante los a√±os 1672 y 1684 y es el lugar donde todos los a√±os se escenifica el M√≠steri de Elche.
Es precisa, acogedora y tranquila... Da paz al entrar, bonita y antigua, llena de tradiciones y belleza.
Un lugar maravilloso, en el centro de Elche, hay misas, es gratis entrar y es pr√°cticamente una catedral

Si vas por Elche hay que verla, puesto que adem√°s la entrada es gratuita. La Bas√≠lica tiene su historia.
Luego, por 2 euros cada adulto, puedes subir por encima del campanario, unos 140 pelda√±os de estrecha escalera de caracol que dan una bonita visi√≥n, desde la alturas, de Elche.
La bas√≠lica es muy bonita tiene mucha luz y est√° en perfectas condiciones lo que m√°s nos ha gustado es la subida al campanario las vistas son impresionantes

Simp√°tica la mujer q est√° atendiendo la torre. Merece pena visita. Iglesia con tradici√≥n hist√≥rica. Buena visita a la torre con m√°s de 160 escaleras, pero no cansa. 2 euros la subida. Bonita Bas√≠lica

La Bas√≠lica est√° ubicada en la Plaza del Congreso Eucar√≠stico de Elche, se comenz√≥ a construir en el a√±o 1.672 y finalizaron las obras en 1.784, de estilo barroco y rococ√≥ y fu√© construida sobre una antigua mezquita.

Merece la pena su visita siempre vayas con un guia, (la Oficina de Informaci√≥n y Turismo pone a disposici√≥n visitas guiadas) ya ademas de explicar la bas√≠lica te descubre la importancia del Misteri.

Es el √∫nico lugar donde se representa una obra religiosa medieval. Su puesta en escena en la Bas√≠lica de Santa Mar√≠a, preparada para ello, es uno de los espect√°culos m√°s imponentes. De obligada visita, por su singularidad y su belleza est√©tica y musical.
Muy bonito y bien cuidado. Emblem√°tico y con gran valor art√≠stico. Buena oferta Gastronomica alrededor de la bas√≠lica.

Espa√±a, es rica en tanta cultura que nuestros antepasados nos dejaron, que antes de conocer otros pa√≠ses debemos de conocer las maravillas que tiene nuestra naci√≥n.
Majestuosa Bas√≠lica, que decora esta ciudad de palmeras y playas fantasticas.

Sin duda una de las insignias de la Ciudad de las Palmeras (Elche)...Preciosa y magn√≠fica Bas√≠lica.. donde todos los a√±os se escenifica uno de nuestros patrimonios de la humanidad m√°s emblem√°ticos y distinguidos..EL MISTERI D'ELX ......Una obra maestra en directo....

Conocida como Bas√≠lica de Santa Maria, en la Edad Media en ese mismo emplazamiento se encontraba una mezquita musulmana pero tras la reconquista el rey Jaime I fue quien la consagr√≥ a la advocaci√≥n de Santa Mar√≠a y al culto cristiano. Desde entonces se ha tenido que construir 3 veces hasta encontrarnos con la actual bas√≠lica. Siendo su √∫ltima restauraci√≥n despu√©s de la guerra civil, pues fue quemada y parcialmente destruida durante la guerra civil Espa√±ola. Si eres muy curioso y te fijas detenidamente en una de sus fachada podr√°s ver las huellas de los impactos de balas.

En su altar mayor podr√°s encontrar a la patrona de la ciudad, la virgen de la Asunci√≥n. patrona de la ciudad. En est√° iglesia es donde se representa el famoso Misteri d'Elx, (Misterio de Elche) que es Patrimonio de la Humanidad. Es la √∫nica representaci√≥n sacro-l√≠rica en el mundo. La representaci√≥n se lleva a cabo los d√≠as 14 y 15 de agosto, se representa gracias a una bula papal otorgada por su Santidad el Papa Urbano III.

Adem√°s la bas√≠lica tiene una Torres Campanario la cual se levant√≥ como edificios anexo a la iglesia. Tiene un acceso independiente a trav√©s de una peque√±a puerta situada en la plaza de Santa Mar√≠a. Podr√°s subir a la torre a trav√©s de una escalera de caracol (160 escalones) en la subida encontrar√°s 2 peque√±as estancias que eran las habitaciones del campanero y su familia. Cuando llegues al mirador podr√°s disfrutar de unas vistas panor√°micas espectaculares de toda la ciudad y de su palmeral. (Hay que pagar entrada para poder subir). Adem√°s desde este mirador es de donde se lanza el 13 de agosto (nit de l‚Äôalba) la palmera imperial de la virgen de la Asunci√≥n.

La bas√≠lica se encuentra situada en el centro de la cuidad, al lado del Museo Arqueol√≥gico y de Historia de Elche (MAHE), Torre de la Calahorra y de su espectacular Parque Municipal. Situada en una plaza rodeada de restaurantes, donde se come muy bien, y hay un buen ambiente.
Bas√≠lica muy bien conservada, c√©ntrica y espectacular, la entrada es gratuita y si quieres ver buenas vistas sube a la torre por un peque√±o importe
Tenemos la mejor basilica de toda la provincia,recomiendo a todo el mundo que venga a visitarla y en agosto esta el misteri, patrimonio de la humanidad
Me ha gustado mucho esta ciudad, estoy nuevo viviendo aqu√≠ y cada rinc√≥n que encuentro me gusta a√∫n m√°s.
Preciosa bas√≠lica tanto por fuera como por dentro, merece la pena su visita, la subida a la torre vale 2 euros. Cierra a las 13 y vuelve a abrir a las 17. Recomendable si vas a Elche

Parece como parada casi obligada el viajar y verlo todo como, en este caso, la Bas√≠lica. Es bonita y visitable 100%. Gratuita a excepci√≥n de las vistas q hay q subir unos 100 escalones pero q no hicimos por problemas de rodilla.
Es muy bonita y grande. Todo muy limpio. No subimos a la torre porque hacia mucha calor. Un lugar digno de visitar.
La entrada es gratuita, de 7 a 13 y de 17.30 a 21 horas. Sin embargo, si quieres subir a la torre, hay que pagar 3 euros. Adem√°s hay tambi√©n visitas teatralizadas.

titulo: C√©ntrica y rodeada de calles peatonales
conteudo: Es uno de los monumentos que puedes visitar en Elche, se encuentra en el casco urbano rodeada de calles peatonales donde poder disfrutar de sus tiendas y restaurantes.
Pendiente subir al torre√≥n. Interior muy bonito y la talla de borriquito del d√≠a de la palma muy bonita

En 1973 fue colocada la primera piedra de la actual Iglesia. La construccion de la misma duro mas de 100 a√±os. En 1936 un gran incendio destruyo casi por completo el interior de la misma. En la Basilica se realizan cada a√±o una representacion sacra llamada La Fiesta o Misterio de Elche. Se puede subir al campanario de la misma por unas 150 escaleras de piedra, siendo el ultimo trecho muy angosto por el cual puede pasar una sola persona.

Bas√≠lica de Santa Mar√≠a fue construida entre 1672 y 1784 con diferentes estilos desde el barroco italianizante de la portada , el rococ√≥ en otras portadas y la girola y el neocl√°sico en el interior. La portada pertenece a Nicollas de Bussy. En el templo se representa el Misteri d'Elx ( Patrimonio de la Humanidad como bien inmaterial desde 2001 por la Unesco). En su interior se guardan las imagines de diferentes cofrad√≠as de la Semana Santa ilicitana. Situada en el centro hist√≥rico de la ciudad junto al famoso Palmeral.

La bas√≠lica es un bonito edificio tanto por dentro como por fuera. Pero lo que m√°s destacar√≠a de este edificio es la subida a su campanario y a su torre mirador. La subida es muy pronunciada, aconsejo calzado c√≥modo, son 170 escalones, pero cuenta con varios rellanos para poder descansar, la parte final para acceder al mirador es muy estrecha. Las vistas que se tienen son verdaderamente espectaculares, y permiten disfrutar de una magn√≠fica vista a√©rea de Elche. Un Imprescindible de Elche.

Drama sacro l√≠rico religioso que se celebra todos los a√±os en Elche en el mes de agosto con motivo de sus fiestas patronales, hay mucha devoci√≥n entre sus seguidores y la representaci√≥n est√° declarada Patrimonio de la Humanidad, es precectiva sacar entrada con mucha anticipaci√≥n.

Entonaba la monja, desde un rinc√≥n de la Bas√≠lica, junto al Sagrado Retablo‚Ä¶
Dios te salve Mar√≠a, llena eres de gracia, el Se√±or es contigo. Bendita t√∫ eres entre todas las mujeres y bendito es el fruto de tu vientre Jes√∫s‚Ä¶
Y las feligresas y las beatas respond√≠an con muy poca voz‚Ä¶
Santa Mar√≠a, madre de Dios, ruega por nosotros pecadores, ahora y en la hora de nuestra muerte amen‚Ä¶
La santa monja repet√≠a una y otra vez la misma oraci√≥n sin cambiar un √°pice, ni una coma, sin cambiar el tono, ni alzar la voz‚Ä¶
Mientras se pod√≠a escuchar, en tono mucho m√°s bajo casi inaudible, la respuesta de las beatas y feligresas a cada una de sus plegarias‚Ä¶
Dios te salve Mar√≠a, llena eres de gracia, el Se√±or es contigo. Bendita t√∫ eres entre todas las mujeres y bendito es el fruto de tu vientre Jes√∫s‚Ä¶
Repet√≠a sin inmutarse, resonaba por la nave central de la Bas√≠lica, bajo la c√∫pula, los ecos que comedidos y pausados se me antojaban hipn√≥ticos y trascendentales, que aumentasen de volumen y que me desbordasen‚Ä¶
Dios te salve Mar√≠a, llena eres de gracia, el Se√±or es contigo. Bendita t√∫ eres entre todas las mujeres y bendito es el fruto de tu vientre Jes√∫s‚Ä¶
Como lluvia que no cesa convertida en canto‚Ä¶
Dios te salve Mar√≠a, llena eres de gracia, el Se√±or es contigo. Bendita t√∫ eres entre todas las mujeres y bendito es el fruto de tu vientre Jes√∫s‚Ä¶
No se ve√≠a apenas desde donde rezaba y rezaba, sin aparente fin, sin cansancio, con fuerzas cada vez renovadas‚Ä¶
Dios te salve Mar√≠a, llena eres de gracia, el Se√±or es contigo. Bendita t√∫ eres entre todas las mujeres y bendito es el fruto de tu vientre Jes√∫s‚Ä¶
El incienso y el perfume a flores acompa√±aba a los ecos, apenas hab√≠a nadie‚Ä¶
Me dio la impresi√≥n de que le hubiera dado igual seguir rezando sus plegarias sin nadie, igual de entregada, con inagotable energ√≠a‚Ä¶
Sent√≠ deseos de beber de aquella santidad que se derramaba‚Ä¶

Adem√°s de ser la bas√≠lica donde se celebra El Misteri, que ya por eso solo merece la pena visitarla, es un edificio no muy grande pero con encanto, se puede subir arriba del todo y ver una panor√°mica incre√≠ble de El Palmeral, as√≠ como de ver desde donde se lanza la palmera de la virgen en la Nit de l'alb√°. Adem√°s est√° en pleno centro y frente al palacio de Altamira y el Mahe. Y a pocos metros de El Palmeral.
Un sitio maravilloso, es espectacular. A los m√°s peque√±os les encant√≥. Un sitio digno de ver con mucha historia

Nunca hab√≠a estado y de ver el
Misterio en la tele la imaginaba mucho m√°s grande. Est√° muy cuidada y bien iluminada. Me gust√≥ pero en ella no me hac√≠a a la idea de c√≥mo se desarrolla este acto tan importante. Me ha faltado imaginaci√≥n o memoria para ubicar todos los elementos y personajes.

Una de las Iglesias m√°s b√≥nitas de Elche,por su grandeza y su estructura antigua.Situada en el centro hist√≥rico de la ciudad,recibe muchas visitas de turistas.Tambi√©n muy conocida por las representaciones del Misteri.

Es una bas√≠lica ubicada en pleno coraz√≥n de Elche, con unas vistas de infarto desde su campanario. Una peque√±a rese√±a que me gusta marcar de este sitio es que, en la guerra civil fue quemada y cuando la restauraron dejaron un peque√±o trozo sin pintar al lado del organo como recuerdo de ese horroroso dia (esta justo conforme entras por la puerta principal, arriba a la izquierda).
Es grande pero aunque por dentro es bonita, lo es mucho m√°s por fuera.me gusto mucho la puerta pr8ncipal y las estatuas de3 peregrinos que hay enfrente de la puerta
Magnifica basilica, pero por supuesto una m√°s de las que hay en Espa√±a, y su visita es muy recomendada.

Esta bas√≠lica es m√°gica nada m√°s verla sin saber de su historia ya impresiona adem√°s se puede visitar su campanario con unas vistas espectaculares de su palmeral un lugar que no hay que dejar de visitar totalmente recomendable

Con la puesta en escena de misteri,de nuevo a elx,una obra Sacro lit√∫rgica,precioso lugar para o√≠r esta m√∫sica y ver la Bas√≠lica de Santa Mar√≠a.la Virgen de Asunci√≥n,patrona de elx y Museo que alberga.recomendable
Un punto indispensable a visitar si vas de visita. Es la bas√≠lica de la Ciudad, bonita pero una bas√≠lica mas de las que tiene Espa√±a.

Cuando la visitamos estaban ensayando para el misterio, parece que hacen un gran espect√°culo, yo personalmente no lo veo tan grandioso,y se ve demasiado el truco en el techo de la iglesia.
En fin.....tiene mucha fama y hay que ir al menos una vez.

titulo: Sin duda hay que visitarlo si o si.
conteudo:
Un lugar bonito de ver, con el mayor √≥rgano de toda Europa y un sitio que es dif√≠cil de ver cerrado (excepto por la noche). Si es posible, ver el Misteri, una representaci√≥n con much√≠simos a√±os de historia que se caracteriza por ser patrimonio de la humanidad junto con el palmeral de Elche.

Un punto a favor: Es gratuito.
Muy bonita y las vistas desde el campario incre√≠bles. Hicimos las recomendaciones del se√±or de la taquilla y fuimos parando en varios cuartos que tiene la subida al campanario y se hizo agradable.
Merece la pena subir al campanario del mirador, son unos 170 escalones pero las vistas y la experiencia lo vale.

Est√° declarada Patrimonio Hist√≥rico de Espa√±a y Bien de Inertes Cultural, es de estilo barroco, la Bas√≠lica tal y como la conocemos se empez√≥ a construir en 1672, tiene planta de cruz latina con una nave central y cuatro capillas a cada lado, destaca su gran c√∫pula recubierta por tejas azules. Se puede subir a su torre desde donde tendremos unas magn√≠ficas vistas de toda la ciudad. La entrada es gratuita a la Bas√≠lica y la subida a la torre cuesta 2 ‚Ç¨.

Es la bas√≠lica de la Ciudad, un punto indispensable a visitar si vas de visita. Culturalmente dice mucho de Elche. Y si estas en estas fechas, no dudes en acudir a la representaci√≥n del Misteri d'Elx.
En la provincia una de las m√°s grandes iglesias. Recomendable visitarla durante el Misteri d¬¥Elx y en las grandes celebraciones. En los alrededores te puedes tomar un tentempi√© tranquilamente.
Es una joya est√° representaci√≥n del patrimonio valenciano, en agosto se representa el 14 y15, hay que verlo al menos una vez en la vida.
Si est√°s en Elche hay que pasar a verla. Por dentro est√° bien y es bastante grande. No tiene mucho m√°s que comentar. Es bonita.

titulo: Muy bonita bas√≠lica, donde se representa el famoso Misteri d'Elx
conteudo:
Muy bonita bas√≠lica, orgullo de la cuidad, donde se representa el famoso Misteri d'Elx, Patrimonio de la Humanidad, de gran belleza y en un entorno muy cuidado. Tiene una subida a la torre, de donde puedes disfrutar de unas vistas panor√°micas espectaculares de toda la ciudad y de su palmeral. (Hay que pagar entrada para poder subir).
Se encuentra situada en el centro de la cuidad, al lado del Museo Arqueol√≥gico y de Historia de Elche (MAHE) y de su espectacular Parque Municipal. Situada en una plaza rodeada de restaurantes, donde se come muy bien, y hay un buen ambiente.
Otro de los puntos clave de Alicante. Hay que verla, adem√°s est√° al lado del museo de arte contempor√°neo, en una plaza rodeada de restaurantes..., por lo que hay buen ambiente.

titulo: Muy interesante la subida a la torre

titulo: UNA VISITA IMPRESCINDIBLE PARA EL VIAJERO QUE VISITE ELCHE
conteudo:
En la Edad Media se encontraba la mezquita musulmana en este emplazamiento que por aquella √©poca era uno de los extremos de la antigua Vila Murada. Cuando el rey Jaime I de Arag√≥n conquist√≥ la ciudad en 1265, consagr√≥ la mezquita bajo la advocaci√≥n de Santa Mar√≠a. Tiene esta iglesia la gran tradici√≥n de celebrar en ella el Misteri d'Elx (Misterio de Elche) obra coral en valenciano antiguo que se representa durante los d√≠a 14 y 15 de agosto de cada a√±o en virtud de una bula papal otorgada por Su Santidad el Papa Urbano VIII.
